text: The Porsche 919 is a LMP (Le Mans Prototype) race car. It was used from late 2014 until its retirement at the end of the 2017 racing season. The car was used in many endurance and 24 hour events across the globe. It was most recognised for winning the 2015, 2016 and 2017 24 Hours of Le Mans races. Category:Porsche automobiles Category:Auto racing
title: Porsche 919
